name: Aquarium Simulator (itch)
description:
Relax and calm yourself down as you listen to the nice ambience of underwater fish. Watch the fish swim with some beautiful background scenery and calm music. Heck use this as a virtual fish tank, or even fall asleep to the smooth calm musical track. You could  also launch this game and use it as a nice visual game screensaver to watch fish swim.

Additional Info:

Made with Unity:

This is an Aquarium Simulator I made after watching a youtube tutorial. There are 3 Aquarium Scenes with different scenery.  Hopefully a webgl release will be made as well as well as more different fish. Enjoy what is implemented so far, and thanks for giving it a try.

More updates about this game and other speed levels can be found here: https://www.facebook.com/Wadester2017/?ref=bookmarks
